name: Bullets Everywhere!
description:
Oh no!  You have found yourself surrounded by projectiles! Can you weave your way through them and make it to the end? The bullets might try and pull a fast one on you though, as they may not go the way you expect.

Fortunately for you, you have a nifty little adrenaline rush with the push of [SPACEBAR]/[LEFTMOUSE] that lets you have just a little more time to keep yourself alive.

As the pilot, you have access to state-of-the-art [WASD]/[ARROW KEYS] controls. Just try not to get any scratches on the ship...

Music by SirGrandPotato:

 - Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfWyo0SbseHX5EErIwtHIlA

- Twitter: https://twitter.com/sirgrandpotato
